result.html: An bhfuil nóiméad agatDo you have a minute?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil nóiméad agatDo you have a minute?

result.eng: I'll be with you in a minute.
result.html: Beidh mé leat ar ballI'll be with you in a minute.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé leat ar ballI'll be with you in a minute.

result.html: Fan bomaiteWait a minute!

result.html: An bhfuil nóiméad agatDo you have a minute?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil nóiméad agatDo you have a minute?

result.eng: Wait a minute and I will get the notebooks for you.
result.ga: Fanaigí nóiméad agus gheobhaidh mé na cóipleabhair dhaoibh
result.orig: Fanaigí nóiméad agus gheobhaidh mé na cóipleabhair dhaoibh
result.html: Fanaigí nóiméad agus gheobhaidh mé na cóipleabhair dhaoibhWait a minute and I will get the notebooks for you.
result.ponchtml: Fanaigí nóiméad agus ġeoḃaiḋ mé na cóipleaḃair ḋaoiḃWait a minute and I will get the notebooks for you.

result.html: Fan nóiméad le do thoilWait a minute, please.
result.ponchtml: Fan nóiméad le do ṫoilWait a minute, please.

result.html: An féidir leat fanacht nóiméadCan you wait a minute?
result.ponchtml: An féidir leat fanaċt nóiméadCan you wait a minute?

result.html: An bhféadfá fanacht nóiméadCould you wait a minute?
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá fanaċt nóiméadCould you wait a minute?

result.eng: Would you mind waiting a minute?
result.html: Ar mhiste leat fanacht nóiméadWould you mind waiting a minute?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁiste leat fanaċt nóiméadWould you mind waiting a minute?

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: Ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
